description.@en: I have seen the dark truth that hides in every man’s soul, and learned to understand its esoteric meanings.

effect.@en: Record this Talent name by your Skill Ranks— Occult. Whenever you use a Skill that could be paired with Occult, ignore any penalties your character is currently suffering from due to your Peril Condition Track. You also gain a +10% Base Chance to use the Skill when paired.
